website_summaries.verdict: Excellent quality of raw chia seeds that are delivered at a desirable price per ounce.
pros: Has a neutral taste that's perfect to mix into other types of foods to add health benefits
Gives you the fiber, protein, and omega fats you want from chia seeds
Delivers just the right level of texture when adding the seeds to a recipe
cons: Bag occasionally ships with foreign particles in it
Some bags have quality control problems with holes in the plastic

customer_reviews.title: Not good for making chai pudding
customer_reviews.text: These seeds do not “swell” up for making chai pudding which is what I mainly use them for. Not sure why but is is a large bag I now have little use for. I buy the Bobs Red Mill and they make the best thick creamy chai pudding. Same recipe. They look exactly alike not sure why this bag from amazon doesn’t work. The seeds stay hard and take on no liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Licata

customer_reviews.title: My dog n I love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My little dog Bella struggles to poop. Started adding chia seeds every other day and boom no more struggles. She loves it too. I also add to my morning smoothies and I love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cliffarubo

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Gel or Expand
customer_reviews.text: 11/1 Update. Amrita @ Healthworks was kind enough to contact and arrange a replacement package for the “defective” bag I originally received. She also asked me for the lot # so that they could investigate that batch for problems. I think this is excellent customer service and QC so I have increased my review stars. Did not get or expand, just got a bit slimy and lumped on the bottom of the container. Tried setting in water for 2 days, even tried boiling water -same results. Useless for chia pudding or smoothies. Don't know if it's a bad batch, or if this is an underperforming strain of chia, but I wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: CWL

customer_reviews.title: ... I was able to find on Amazon for the best price. I started using it for dietary reasons ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest bag I was able to find on Amazon for the best price. I started using it for dietary reasons with each of my meals. I'm one of those people that if I look at something and decide I'm not going to like it, my mind will trick me into getting sick when eating it. Chia Seeds are GREAT...they have NO taste, but also add texture to food that doesn't normally have any. I've used it in yogurts, puddings, ice cream...anything! It really does keep you full too!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany L Porter

customer_reviews.title: Good as supplement, not for cooking
customer_reviews.text: The amount you get is a great value but when you inspect it for quality and results, it kind of falls through. Yes this is a good price but just remember that sometimes you get what you pay for... so don’t compromise quality for a lower price. Now I wouldn’t say these are completely bad, I think it’s great as a supplement such as trying to get in your fiber. But if you are trying to make food dishes with this, I don’t think this would hold up. So in summary, good as a supplement but not for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: GThiel

customer_reviews.title: Beware Chia Seed Fire Sale
customer_reviews.text: I like a bargain but I also like gelatinous chia seed pudding which is something that this product doesn't provide no matter how long they soak in a liquid. Already disposed the container they came in and will suffer till they're gone and hope that some nutritional good is happening while they are coursing through my GI tract. Pay a couple dollars more and buy a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for digestive regularity
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic for digestive regularity without any of the side effects of other things. When I make my morning protein shake, I put maybe a tablespoon of these in first, so they get soaked with more water. Add all my other things, protein powder, matcha tea, beet root, etc, and shake it up. When the seeds are wet like this, they remind me of the lumpiness in something like rice pudding, very easy to drink and digest. Basically flavorless. You might possibly find yourself going to the bathroom a little more, but this beats the heck out of being backed up and not being able to go.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reinholz

customer_reviews.title: No poisons, no chemicals, lower cost.  PLEASE REWRITE PRODUCT TITLE ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally, an organic grain that costs less than the corporate/toxic products. I eat chia in all my hot cereals. Recommended by a health-conscious doctor. ADDED COMMENT: In reviewing my orders in the email stack, I saw the title line, "Healthworks Pesticide ...." What? What did I order? I clicked through, typed in my password, reviewed --- "Healthworks Pesticide and Chemical-Free Chia" Wonderful. Not what I feared. As a writing instructor, I always cautioned classes of students on titling their work. Now, with the very brief titles shown in email displays, the first two or three words must describe the product. I suggest, Healthworks Chia, Natural, Pesticide and Chemical-Free Super-Food
customer_reviews.author: VideoAdventures

customer_reviews.title: Great in Smoothies and Chia Puddings
customer_reviews.text: I love the Healthworks Chia Seeds. In bulk, especially, they are well priced. The 2 pound bag has lasted over a month, with daily use. I make chia pudding, stir seeds into my oatmeal and smoothies, sprinkle seeds into breading, baked goods and atop salads. I have enjoyed experimenting with the blank canvas of chia pudding. My Nuts About Chai Chia Pudding recipe has quickly become my favorite, combining a lot of my favorite flavors into a healthy dessert! I also enjoy blending in 1 TBSP of chia seeds to my morning green juices and smoothies. The liquid in the smoothies helps the seeds to "bloom" and makes the drink more filling without a ton of extra calories.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: They don't gel.
customer_reviews.text: I mean, yes they are chia seeds, but they didn't gel pretty much at all. They soaked for hours and there was no gel. They didn't have a good texture. I was really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rader

customer_reviews.title: First purchase-added nutrition
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a friend, so I add onto healthy salads for an added crunch. Sometimes sprinkle add to toasted sandwich. Supposed to be healthy ingredient. Not sure if I notice any difference. Like that it ships with 2lb. package so I emptied plastic bag into my own containers. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Itsme

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY- contains plastic fillers!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand of chia seeds for years and am disgusted to just find out that they add plastic fillers mixed with the seeds!! I was stirring some chia pudding i made and notice a few small black specks. I fished them out with a fork and the more i stirred, the more i found! To see more clearly, i made a small batch in just water and not surprisingly found the tiny black particles again, this time a bigger chia-seed-sized one as well. Beyond disappointed in this brand for adding plastic- which should never be consumed- to an edible product, especially one advertised as so nutritious and healthy! Appalling!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I did not get any sort of discount, but am very pleased with these chia seeds, and think they are fairly priced. I've been purchasing a different brand for years at the nearest "membership club" store, but the last couple of bags I got there had an off-taste, like a linseed oil kind of taste (possibly unripe when packed??). These Healthworks Chia seeds have great flavor and crunchiness. I add them to cereal (1 Tbsp. per bowl) or to smoothies (2 Tbsp. per large smoothie) and they keep the bowels extremely happy. I recommend these highly. :)
customer_reviews.author: JoneBTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Item Description
customer_reviews.text: 1. Says 100% satisfaction guarantee and to return the product within 30-days for a full refund. Umm, so why is this not eligible for return? I wanted to return this because the description says pesticide-free but this is not stated anywhere on the bag. Additionally, the bag looks like it was used for soccer practice.
customer_reviews.author: Adirondack customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a really big bag of chia seeds
customer_reviews.text: This is a really big bag of chia seeds. I like to sprinkle them on top of yogurt along with some granola, and I've had this bag for like 6 months and i'm not even half way done with it yet. Just one ounce of chia seeds gives you 11 grams of fiber and 4 grams of protein, for only 137 calories. The are packed with vitamins and minerals including Calcium, Manganese, Magnesium, and Phosphorus. They are also high in omega-3's. All around they are a "super food" and make an excellent and simple addition to any diet.
customer_reviews.author: April C

customer_reviews.title: Great company fresh product
customer_reviews.text: Love this company! Always pleased with their products. (I love to soak my Chia seeds in a little almond milk. This opens them up to absorption. Easier digestion). Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy fiber - put them in everything!
customer_reviews.text: Chia seeds are my new favorite thing. I put 2 tbsp in my morning smoothies, and I add them to oatmeal too. I even made a delicious blueberry chia seed jam (that I eat with the oatmeal -- it's amazing). They get gooey when submerged in liquid, so they worked great as thickeners for the jam and oatmeal and would probably be fine in homemade soup or salad dressing too. Chia seeds don't taste like anything, and unlike flax, they actually have an agreeable texture. Just tons and tons of easy fiber. I dunno if these seeds are any better than any other brand, but the price seems great for the amount you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: lady1291

customer_reviews.title: VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how much I was purchasing. This is a LOT of Chia for the price! I had to consult my health nutritionalist girlfriend to figure out what I could do with all of this Chia seed! I'm just using it for extra fiber in smoothies right now, but I'm looking forward to trying out other uses. The package seal is really great! When I purchased this I was concerned about the resealable packaging and planned on other means for storage, but this thing zips up VERY tight and secure. I would purchase this product and other HealthWorks products again. Excellent product and value.
customer_reviews.author: Kat O

customer_reviews.title: I really love this product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. When i ordered this item from amazon, i wasn't expecting it to arrive to so fast in the mail. I immediately took some with me to work and put a bit of the chia seeds in my drink. The chia seeds do expand quickly and i am satisfied with my purchase. I bought this because i needed something to keep my stomach full that way i could focus more on work and not having to snack so much all the time. I also bought this for health reasons as well so i am looking forward to my purchase and see the results of what using chia seeds will give me.
customer_reviews.author: Malaika Etmens

customer_reviews.title: Tiny health miracle
customer_reviews.text: I was recently reading about natural healing and everywhere there seemed to be a mention of Chia seed. I decided to research it further and was surprised to find that there are so many health benefits of this nutritional powerhouse. In brief, they contain omega-3 fatty acids, carbohydrates, protein, fiber, antioxidants, and calcium. One ounce (about 2 tablespoons) contains 139 calories, 4 grams of protein, 9 grams fat, 12 grams carbohydrates and 11 grams of fiber, plus vitamins and minerals. The two pound bag is at a great price and the subscribe and save option helps you save even more money.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Talpade

customer_reviews.title: You have to try!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Never tried before. I soak seeds all night then add a couple table spoons to almond milk and blue berries.. I have found something that actually works for constipation. I eat daily for best results. I have noticed that my skin on my face looks softer. Not sure if this is because of eating chia seeds or not. I have eaten for 1 week only but, I like how I feel and look for such a short time of eating.
customer_reviews.author: Gomommygo

customer_reviews.title: It's a Good Size and a Good Package
customer_reviews.text: The price was well below what I've found locally. It seems to be a specialty item. This was cheaper, by far, than what I've found otherwise. The packaging is good and sturdy and easily accessible and easy to reseal.
customer_reviews.author: H. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunatelly, when we received our box, the bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunatelly, when we received our box, the bag of chia seeds had been opened and had a large white tape or name tag holding the top together. The quick fix didn't work since there were chia seeds all over the box....
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: These are the cleanest chias seeds we've found for the best price.
customer_reviews.text: We seriously LOVE these chia seeds at our house. We ran out and bought some random bulk chias at the grocery store and we're very disappointed. The seeds had "debris" mixed in... like other plant parts. With this Health works brand, we have never had this problem. They are pure and clean! They even reconstitute better - more plump. My husband works outside and adds Powerade drink mix to his pre-soaked chias for ultra-hydration and energy. It keeps him from getting heat stroke. Great product. I'd highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LMNtree

customer_reviews.title: Delicious chia seeds at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love chia seeds and put them in breads, smoothies, and chia seed pudding. I tried to buy them locally at the health food store in my neighborhood but was shocked at how expensive they were. Naturally, I turned to Amazon and was impressed by the price of these chia seeds. I tried them, and they taste fantastic- exactly the same as they sell at the health food store but about 1/3 the price. Chia seeds swell up when you make pudding with them, so a little goes a long way. I'm sure this bag will last me a while and I will buy this again when I run out due to the great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Goldsman

customer_reviews.title: When my stock runs out, I will be ordering from them again.
customer_reviews.text: Came in a clear re-sealable bag just as pictured. I use it in my smoothies/shakes, chia pudding(chia seeds made with almond milk), and oatmeal so far. I store it in the bag it came in, in my kitchen cabinet along with my other baking goods and it has been just as great since the day it came four months ago. You can't beat the value for the amount you get. It does not say organic however it says pesticide and chemical free and that is over half the battle in my book. When my stock runs out, I will be ordering from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Brackenridge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Since I am taking chia seeds, about a year now...no problem with digestion, ever! And no weight gain!!!! added 4/6/16 This is the 3rd time I am ordering this so you can guess I am very satisfied with it. I don't know about other people but I love my chia seeds with yogurt. These chia seeds are very consistent quality and clean. I am saying that because I happen to buy sometime store brand and there was some residue, like pieces of peel. But these seeds are perfect and I do continue to buy them. It is perfect for digestive health and I love the crunchiness.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: energizing!
customer_reviews.text: Chia seeds are all the talk right now. I jumped on the bandwagon and I love them! I have never been a coffee drinker but as I get older I find myself becoming more sluggish and since I started the Chia seeds I feel like myself again. 1-2 T in my shake in the morning is all I need for energy throughout the day. I soak mine in whatever liquid I am adding to my shake for 5-10 minutes before. It will create a gel like liquid. But once I blend it up it doesn't make a big difference. They do not really have a taste and take on the taste of whatever they are mixed in.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Proulx

customer_reviews.title: chia seeds great for women body
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped with a lot of problems . one cup of water the chia seeds table set for thrity mintues pour into blender add table spoon honey and lemon juice or one lemon squeezed. Great for women body
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: A staple in our home in smoothies. I ran out so bought some at store and they contained much more debri/hulls so going back to this brand that is much cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hurst Nicoll

customer_reviews.title: Not good for chia pudding
customer_reviews.text: I've made chia puddings with this brand of chia seeds as well as others. For some reason, when using the chia seeds from this brand the pudding does not gel to form the right consistency. They might be good for other uses, but not for chia pudding.
customer_reviews.author: Zeev Saffir

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to Your Healthy Shake
customer_reviews.text: i add these to my oatmeal and protein shake to bulk them up and make me feel fuller. They are pretty tasteless but do add a little crunch to your shake. Great source of fiber.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like nothing (strange) and fills you up
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving these Chia seeds! I put them on oatmeal, cream of wheat, yogurt, stews and soups. They help to keep me full longer and there really is no added taste though I like the little crunch they add. They swell in your mouth a little before you can get them all swallowed and feel like gelatin. I feel great when on them but when I'm eating them I'm usually eating healthy all around so it's hard to say how much should be attributed to the Chia seeds and how much to the other healthful foods. Regardless, it feels good to put something nutritious in your body. I'll buy these again and again.
customer_reviews.author: LodgingLady

customer_reviews.title: I like putting chia seeds in all kinds of things
customer_reviews.text: I like putting chia seeds in all kinds of things, from yogurt to smoothies. This brand is OK, nicely packaged, good price. However, it has more seeds that are hard and gritty than other brands I've used. Not an issue in a smoothie, but definitely in yogurt or cereal or anything where it's sprinkled on. UPDATE: I ordered another bag and it's much better than the previous one. No grit, very few hard seeds. The price continues to be hard to beat. So I'll add another star to this review.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Ligget

customer_reviews.title: I am so delighted with everything about these chia seeds!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these chia seeds and they'll be a staple in my life. In just a day, I have created a delicious chia chocolate ice cream healthy and low carb for diabetics and dieters! New to chia, these were top notch, great response to liquid, so fresh.
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good for my Health!
customer_reviews.text: Breakfast is very important - and I'm never hungry so decided to eat something healthy to keep me full until snack time. Just over 1/4 cup of Non-Fat Plain Greek Yogurt, 1 tablespoon of these chia seeds, 1 tablespoon of slivered almonds - mixed by spoon and topped with blueberries. With this, I look forward to breakfast! Introduced chia seeds to my diet about a year ago after losing about 20 lbs. The object is to maintain my current weight with healthy eating (non processed foods) I believe this is an integral part of starting my days off right! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Diney

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Pretty standard chia seeds at a good price. A bag this size lasts me a long time. I'm a huge fan of the sealing feature on the bag, and the seeds themselves are good quality. I will have at least a tablespoon a day in my cereal, oatmeal, or smoothie, and a bag this size still lasts me for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great price, I put a Tbs of them in my smoothie everyday. Good, fresh, great quantity and price. Bag is also good quality and seals back up easily which is a huge plus for me. It is the little things. Will buy again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I love chia seeds! I tend to add them to just about everything! I love that they are so full of calcium as well as other benefits as it is so hard to get the proper amount of calcium. If you are someone who doesn't like the gelatinous texture after they have absorbed moisture, just add them to something they will get lost in, like a soup of meatloaf. I have used them in addition to eggs in cookies, and they taste like roasted sesame seeds after they are baked. There are a hundred and one ways to use these, and this is a very good source for them!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austin

customer_reviews.title: No longer good
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy these regularly to turn into gel for my smoothies. A few months back, I received a bad batch. No matter what I did, they would never absorb water and turn into a gel. I returned them for a refund and switched to another brand. Recently, I decided to try Healthworks again. Once again, I got a bad batch that wouldn't gel. At this point, I've given up on Healthworks.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I add these to a recipe for "overnight oatmeal" for their nutritional value and the bit of crunch they contribute to the texture. They are packed in a heavy resealable bag that is good for storage in itself, or the seeds can easily be poured into another storage container without spillage. The price is more reasonable than can be found in our local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE Best Chia
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten chia from supermarkets and big-box stores before, as I consume a few tablespoons of them every day as part of a breakfast shake. These are hands down the best. ALL of the other chia seeds I've used contain small rocks which are very very unappetizing. These do not. I haven't come across a single stone in any of the several bags I've purchased & the price is extremely competitive!
customer_reviews.author: I. Brasslett

customer_reviews.title: I Loved these. They don't have much flavor
customer_reviews.text: I Loved these. They don't have much flavor, so I add them to water and drink twice a day. It is a texture thing, some people don't like the texture. Kind of reminds me of Tapioca texture. The seeds soak in the water. They do fill you up some and help curb appetite. Helps me avoid late afternoon snacking. I have tried another brand and they had lots of "debris" felt like I had a mouth full of sand and pebbles by the end of my drink. Healthworks Chia Seeds were great Little to NO Debris. They have lots of health benefits. Including fiber, to help keep you regular. Would recommend. Will be buying this Brand always
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: I have been using these seeds for a couple months ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these seeds for a couple months after my zumba instructor (who is from Mexico) suggested them to help me with my appetite. It does help some with appetite, especially early in the day and helps with energy level for my workouts. I just eat 1 tsp of them every morning. I don't mix with water. It's easier for me just to gulp them down. They don't really have a taste. I can tell a difference using them.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Improve Regularity!
customer_reviews.text: These things are great for improving regularity. I thoroughly mix up an eighth of a cup of seeds with 6 oz. of warm water and two tablespoons of honey. Give the seeds a couple of minutes to absorb some of the water and then enjoy. I like to crunch the seeds, too, as they have a nut like flavor.
customer_reviews.author: W. Brock

customer_reviews.title: I've gotten some good results in terms of the health benefits
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten some good results in terms of the health benefits. However, this is the second time ordering this with a total of 3 bags and this one was only half filled and had seeds mushed up in the sealing. I guess it was just a one time thing but its hard to believe because I've also ordered Goji Berries from Health works a second time and this time they were not filled up at all. Just mushed up 3-5 pieces thick. The portions seem to have big differences sometimes but quality is good as far as i know.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Ma

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Received the chia seeds today. First, I inspected the bag and saw no twigs or debris. I soaked the seeds for about an hour, then added them to my spirulina and banana smoothie. Delicious! I love the texture of the soaked chia seeds -- my smoothie was almost like a light pudding. This is a great value and this inexpensive bag will last a long time. I may even start giving bags as gifts to some of my more health-conscious friends! Glad I ordered and feel confident about ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Superior Chia! Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase of Healthworks Chia seeds. They showed up on my doorstep in two days using Amazon Prime. These seeds are of exceptional quality; appear to contain NO immature (yellow/brown) seeds or foreign matter (leaves, other plant particles). They plump up very nicely overnight to create wonderfully healthy puddings. I've made some delicious and healthy treats with these chia over the past few months including my current favorite: Almond Joy Chia Pudding: coconut milk, chia, a few drops of vanilla flavored sweetener and cocoa nibs sprinkled on top.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana C.

customer_reviews.title: Not understanding why Target Stores Chia Seeds work better than these????  Baffled and Sad.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Chia Seeds for my digestive issues and keeping my immunity supported. I've purchased these bc they're organic and the weight of the bag plus the minimal cost was exciting, I couldn't wait. I've been using them as I eat and drink them with everything. Let me tell you, the chia seeds I buy from Target stores do me much, MUCH better. I do not understand why? Seems my last 3-4 Amazon orders have been a bust of problems. I am sad.
customer_reviews.author: Reverend Jolene A. Seebacher

customer_reviews.title: I've learned how to make so many different things with them and their health benefits are fantastic. My new favorite drink is Ch
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go along with a detox I was doing. I didn't know much about them before I bought them and was a bit hesitant to order such a large quantity. Definitely worth it! I've learned how to make so many different things with them and their health benefits are fantastic. My new favorite drink is Chia Fresca! Gonna be a while before I run out and am thankful to have order such a large amount.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. and Mrs. C

customer_reviews.title: Great Product/Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great item. I use about 4 tbsp in my morning shake. Even though my ninja, does not completely shred the seeds-it doesn't matter. After I make my shake, I wait about 15 minutes before I drink it-the seeds actually swell up and become very soft. They actually taste really good. I would recommend this product to anyone trying a more healthy lifestyle. Also, the seeds seem to fill you up a little more, so you are not quite as hungry later on.
customer_reviews.author: Yolo

customer_reviews.title: Still learning the many ways to use this! I ...
customer_reviews.text: Still learning the many ways to use this! I did some research and found out that caution needs to be used. These tiny seeds do swell quite a bit w/liquids. Do not know if it is true, but I read that one over enthusiastic woman died after ingesting several tablespoons of these seeds dry. The article stated she choked as they swelled in her throat. I soak mine before using in various recipes to avoid such.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J Klingbeil

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Did not perform properly. Definitely not going to order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my oatmeal. They taste good. I also wanted to mention how well they're packed. The plastic bag is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy - South Florida

customer_reviews.title: Blend!
customer_reviews.text: Well I purchased these knowing I am not a "texture" person and I thought surely I could handle this. I started off with just a tablespoon and well.... If you are like me and want to try these, make sure you have the blender ready because the "gel" was unbearable in my drink. But once I got the blender out and whipped these up there was very little taste and I'm still reaping the nutritious value. Will definitely keep using. Packaging was great and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Murguia

customer_reviews.title: I think it helps
customer_reviews.text: I was not really wanting to eat seeds. So when a friend gave them to me I put them into veggie pill caps. You can buy them here on amazon. That way the caps disolve in my stomach and the seed expand there. (well in theroy anyways) I guess I did something right because about a half hour after taking the caps. I do feel fuller. A little change in energy that I notice and I do feel fuller. After a week I have lost 2 pounds so I ordered some for myself to give it a longer try.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great in Smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: I have been adding these into the smoothies that I make using NutriBullet. It is too soon for me to tell if these seeds are improving my health, but I will most likely order these again. When Mixed in with other ingredients I cannot taste them. However, the NutriBullet does leave enough bulk for me to feel them when they are in my mouth. I am OK with this. Michael Robert Serovey Author of many books that are available on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Serovey

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after reading the book "Born to Run". It was described as a natural, organic energy food, so as an endurance athlete, it sparked my interest. However, after using the product for the past month or so, I'm not sold on Chia as a real energy drink. It is a good alternative to soda as a morning or afternoon snack. It does seem to help in the digestion system as well. I mix it with water and a little lemon juice to make "Chia Fresca" that was described in the book. Interesting texture and taste. I don't think I'll be running with this product in my water bottle anytime soon!
customer_reviews.author: Roger T.

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU, OTHER REVIEWERS!
customer_reviews.text: The other reviewers were right — this is a great product. I will keep it on hand from now on and use it daily. I also purchased a small recipe book for Chia seeds. UPDATE 12/9/15: I have found many uses for this product. I grind it and use it in my smoothies for protein and fiber, and use the ground chis seeds as an egg replacer in vegan recipes. I now have it on monthly delivery.
customer_reviews.author: J. GAUDET

customer_reviews.title: Best Chia seeds  around
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the chia seeds I have tried, I like this one. Crunchy. I take an empty spaghetti jar, add a half a jar of good water and then add 1/3 cup of chia seeds to it, fill the rest of the jar with water, put on the lid and shake it for 30 seconds. Let the jar sit on the counter for15 minutes and then shake it again for 30 seconds. Refrigerate the jar. The seeds absorb the water and form a jelly. Eat 3 tablespoons twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: RON K.

customer_reviews.title: I can't attest to the health benefits of chia seeds but these seemed like a great deal
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged and on time. I can't attest to the health benefits of chia seeds but these seemed like a great deal. I sprinkle them on any food I eat and it doesn't change the taste. The texture is almost like poppy seeds which is great for sandwiches and bagels. I don't notice the texture at all when mixed with pasta or yogurt. They seem to be filling me up and I'm eating less but i don't know if that's just in my head or what.
customer_reviews.author: Golden gecko

customer_reviews.title: Yummy chia
customer_reviews.text: I put chia seeds in my protein shakes and other foods, as well. This bag is GI-NORMOUS. Great bang for my buck and I am enjoying them each day
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie L. Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: Love Chia!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered Chia through Sarma Melngailis's book, Living Raw Food. There's a recipe in that book for a type of chia porridge--you just add some water, cinnamon, vanilla, agave and nut milk and let it sit 15-30 minutes and you have a yummy, hydrating, nutrient rich live food to fuel you for your morning. I've been hooked ever since. (You can find the recipe on her website,[...]).Perfect for camping or traveling or just a solid meal for everyday. Some might find the texture strange, but there are many uses for Chia and many reasons to eat it. This is a good price too.
customer_reviews.author: The Modern Travelers

customer_reviews.title: One of my health challenges is very high cholesteral, ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my health challenges is very high cholesteral, so I've been using these chia seeds to help melt away the plaque in my blood vessels. Don't know if this schtuff really works or not but it soitenly cain't hurt to try it. I use chia seeds mostly in my leafy salads. Hmmm... never thought I would be saying that I eat green schtuff, but I've had to change my eating habits from 100% junk food to only 10% junk food and 90% healthy if I want to live long enough to see retirement.
customer_reviews.author: Dale T. Brose

customer_reviews.title: I now add a tablespoon of Chia seed and love it. It adds a different texture and taste ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had tried this earlier. It seems to give me a boost in energy and also fiber that is needed daily. I am an oatmeal eater, everyday. I now add a tablespoon of Chia seed and love it. It adds a different texture and taste to the oatmeal and hopefully it will help me to keep my cholesterol level low. I also add it to a fruit smoothy that I make several times a week and love the new addition. I do know I will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Catman

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, taste better than normal store bought seeds. Very happy with selection
customer_reviews.author: D Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant odor
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a weird odor when I opened the bag. Didn’t think anything more until I used it. Even in small amounts on yogurt etc., it still smells. Not returnable, so I’ve just dumped it. Love Viva.
customer_reviews.author: Nilodam

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I grind this up and add it to my protein powder, cacoa and flaxseed...
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: Love these chia seeds
customer_reviews.text: Love these chia seeds, they come well packaged. I soak then drink them 3x a day, I have noticed some skin clear up and I think the fiber in it is helping my blood sugars, Love this stuff! Edit Feb-March - Opened it up and made my usual cup of water with 1 Tblsp seeds, tastes like pesticide this time, not sure what could have happened these have been so good in the past....
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price, the quality is as expected. The bag is bigger than I thought, which is great. I use it mostly in my traditional agua de limón and in my smoothies. Chia fan for life.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana C.

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: When my package arrived, i picked it up and could hear all the seeds floating around the box like sand. I didn't even want to open it because i knew it was going to be a mess! Sure enough, the bag the chia seeds came in had gotten a few holes in it, and about half the bag was spilled all in the cardboard mailing box :( It wouldn't be that big of a deal if these weren't food items, but eating them after they'd been floating around in the mail for a week seemed unsanitary so I had to throw most of my bag away. Not ordering from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: grw

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have, and at the Best Value!
customer_reviews.text: Best value you can find anywhere! Great quality. I love how a little goes a long way! I mix two tablespoons with about 1/4 cup of almond milk every night and let it set in the fridge for the next morning. I have been feeling great and more regular. This is an excellent way to get in your daily fiber and amazing for anyone on Atkins or Ketogenic/Keto diet since it has ZERO NET CARBS! How cool?! This is definitely a must-have staple for your health!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: More value than going into the stores. Strong re-sealable bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I know I have more energy from them and my arthritics in my knees and back are better. It is a nice big 2 lb
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for several months, mainly on food. I have a friend that uses it in milk. These add no taste and sometimes a little crunchy. I try to take 2-3 tablespoons a day. I know I have more energy from them and my arthritics in my knees and back are better.It is a nice big 2 lb. bag so it does last a while. For the first week or so it serves as a cleanser to your system but after that things normalize. I think it is pushing all the junk our of your system and cells.. I would definitely recommend this to those who are trying to improve their health.
customer_reviews.author: lavinia johnson

customer_reviews.title: Everything has come out wonderfully every time
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble finding bulk Chia seeds around me, so I was thrilled when I bought these. I include them in my daily smoothie. I also use them to make overnight oatmeal and Chia pudding. Everything has come out wonderfully every time. I also drink Chia water 3x per week, so buying in bulk is a must. The bag was huge, and the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: LBurtie1981

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by how clean this bag of chia seeds was. Sounds silly but my first bag had all kinds of small twigs and rocks inside that you had to pick out before using and since I never had chia seeds prior to that I just assuned that's how they were supposed to be. So glad I was wrong! I love adding these to my milk tea as 'fake' tapioca. They're not exactly the same but the texture and consistency of them kind of remind me of tiny tapioca bubbles with a bit of crunch to them.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth W.

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving this item 2 stars due to consistency. I like to add water to the seeds and let them absorb the water before eating. They become a “gel”. The first bag was great. The second bag I ordered was a disappointment. The seeds hardly absorbed any water when left in a cup for 10 minutes. Almost as if they were harvested too early. The seeds are small anyway, so hard to notice a size difference.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product is fresh and delivery was fast. I use this for my smoothies and it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kuma M

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My sister didn't complain and she liked her gift so I guess that it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Cholena Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: They're Good For You & Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I recently learned about the health benefits of Chia seeds and began to purchase the ground ones from Healthworks. I am very happy with them. They arrive fresh in an airtight bag which has a ziploc closure for reuse. I especially appreciate that they are the ground seeds, which means I can add them into just about anything for a nutty flavor. I will continue to purchase this product at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Chia seed great addition to smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my Whey smoothies puts texture in it...
customer_reviews.author: J. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: High quality Chia Seeds
customer_reviews.text: Found these Chia Seeds to be better than the ones I bought from trader joes. The one from trader joes often times had small bits of twigs and things I'd have to pick out, non of that in these chia seeds. The price is superior as well. I use them in a lot of food. I mix them with my protein shakes and sprinkle them on different foods. Price wise it is good, but still expensive compared to chia seeds that I started to see at my local costco.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Chan

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Good price. Very fresh tasting and smelling chia seeds. Much better than the local bulk foods options I have been buying. I take two tablespoons, twice daily. Very satisfying and satiating. Never a rancid seed. Never any stems or twigs.
customer_reviews.author: Heath K

customer_reviews.title: Enough energy for me to give up coffee
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the recommended serving size, I knew right away that these seeds were what I've been looking for. I've been looking for natural energy instead of supplements, and theses did not disappoint. I have a lot of problems with supplements raising my heart rate to the point that I can't get the most out of my runs, but these didn't give me that effect, intact they gave me a really good boost. They also helped curve my appetite and that is just an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: N_Ansel

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I normally purchase my chia seeds from Azchia.com but I wanted to give this brand a try because I use Amazon for everything.... There are lots of hard non-chia bits mixed in which is disappointing. It is easy to tell it isn't chia, or perhaps it isn't mature chia, because these hard pieces don't gel up. Other than that, it isn't too bad of a buy.
customer_reviews.author: BettyYerCrocker

customer_reviews.title: Chia Seeds
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. I use it on my meals and it blends well with whatever I am eating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice deal here
customer_reviews.text: very nice deal here, it tastes awesome in my smoothie and the overwhelming records of health benefits according to experts are undeniable **Edit** Very nice value in the 2lb bag, I use a lot per day and its still going strong 2-3 weeks after .... liking it a lot... I will probably invest in an even bigger bag next time XD
customer_reviews.author: Sachit Shetty

customer_reviews.title: Product is in great condition
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my Chia seeds! I didn't have anything weird in the bag, like other people had mentioned. Everything was well sealed. I try and use them every day. I keep a tablespoon in the bag so I can just scoop a serving onto or into whatever I'm eating.
customer_reviews.author: Gerina Figg

customer_reviews.title: I love these chia seeds and use a tablespoon everyday in ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these chia seeds and use a tablespoon everyday in my juice. This was my first time buying Chia seeds so I haven't had any previous experience with any other brands but I made this purchase after reading all the review and I'm highly satisfied with my purchase. After I started adding these into my juice, I feel full through out the day and don't feel like I need to snack.
customer_reviews.author: sosu

customer_reviews.title: Cha-cha-cha-chia!
customer_reviews.text: This is a BIG bag of chia seeds! Maybe I don't have a good grasp on ounces but I was really surprised by this when I opened the box. I tried to make that popular-on-Pinterest chia pudding and it was disgusting so now I add a couple teaspoons to the protein shake I make daily for an extra boost of nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: zomg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Chia seeds! I've heard so many complaints about people finding rocks in their Chia, but this bag didn't contain a single stone, just 100 percent Chia. They were fresh and delicious :) Fantastic for all of my recipes and morning shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and recommended
customer_reviews.text: These are good, no problems with them whatsoever, and at a very good price. I use them in yoghurt and/or cereals at least four times a week so I have a pretty good feel for them. Buying in bulk not only saved money but it is easy to keep store the bulk of them in the freezer and refrigerator and still see how much is left before it is time to reorder. The resealable top is really nice, too; very handy. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Britton

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously addictive
customer_reviews.text: I opted to try these things, to incorporate into my keto diet. They are fantastic! I love making them into pudding or blending them into my protein shakes. They absorb a lot of water, so they'll thicken anything you add them to! I've eaten at least 1/4 cup almost every day since I've ordered these. I will definitely be ordering more soon at this rate!
customer_reviews.author: Megan D'Allura

customer_reviews.title: Bugs and tiny stones
customer_reviews.text: I have also gotten halfway thru my bag before finding that there are tiny little bug living in the bag. I mean I've already consumed half the bag and didn't realize I was drinking theses bugs until now. I feel so disgusted. I love chia seeds but am now super paranoid about purchasing them thru amazon. I would think a product with so many great reviews would be bug free and particle free. So disappointed. Worst part is technically nothing can be done due to the purchase being over 30 days ago. 😞
customer_reviews.author: River

customer_reviews.title: My goto for Chia seeds
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering this brand of Chia for a while and there's no reason for me to switch to another. Good value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: I'll  have to find another brand
customer_reviews.text: These were growing flying bugs with lots of webbing in an air tight mason jar. Amazon refunded my $
customer_reviews.author: P. Paxton

customer_reviews.title: I have had better.
customer_reviews.text: I started eating chia seed pudding for breakfast earlier this year when I found out I was diabetic. I usually have it everyday. I had used a different brand until I bought these. These do not pull in the liquid. Using same recipe I have always used, it is very thin and the seeds do not plump up.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Good seeds.  Might even be good for you
customer_reviews.text: Really like these in my smoothies for the texture (add to your cup after you fill it and stir quickly) . The seeds don't cling to the inside of the bag like some other brands do
customer_reviews.author: justmeboss

customer_reviews.title: Great to Buy👍
customer_reviews.text: Loved them they are great just right and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Gass

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. My bad did not look like the picture, but it was still what I ordered. Great addition to smoothies, yogurts, and anything really. Adds a perfect amount of crunch, protein, and fiber to dishes. If you're looking to get healthier, buy these! My bag lasted me many months before I ran out, and that was using 1-2 tablespoons a day.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

product_meta.title: Healthworks Chia Seeds Raw (32 Ounces / 2 Pounds) | Premium & All-Natural | Contains Omega 3, Fiber & Protein | Great with Shakes, Smoothies & Oatmeal
product_meta.description:
Chia seeds have been around for thousands of years but have been becoming more popular due to their potent health benefits. Used as a popular staple in South America, Chia Seeds are the ultimate seed for wellness and health. They can be the super food blast that brings your diet to the next level!

Healthworks Raw Chia Seeds are loaded with nutrients such as Omega-3 Fatty Acids, Plant-Based Protein and Fiber.

Our Healthworks Chia Seeds Raw is pure, all-natural, vegan, vegetarian, non-GMO, making it a great addition to any lifestyle. Chai Seeds can even be used as a vegan egg substitute when mixed with water.

Healthy & Delicious, add Healthworks Chia Seeds to your diet and reap the benefits!

Being neutral in taste, you can add these versatile little seeds in many of your favorite dishes and drinks!

Recommended to try with: Smoothies, Shakes, Baked Goods, Oatmeal, Puddings, Yogurt, Baked Goods (Protein Cookies & Cakes), Energy Balls, Granola, Salads, Crusts, Salads, Pies, Coconut & more! Our Chia Seeds also go very well with Healthworks Coconut Milk Powder, Flax Seeds & Psyllium Husk Powder!

Ingredients: Salvia Columbariae
feature_bullets: PREMIUM RAW, CHIA SEEDS: Healthworks Chia Seeds are all-natural, nut-free and grain-free. They can go with all dietary restrictions such as vegan, nut-free, raw, low-car, keto & paleo friendly. Free of additives and harmful ingredients. It can be used in countless recipes due to its flavorless properties.

MANY BENEFITS & NUTRIENTS: Packed with antioxidants and essential vitamins & minerals such as calcium, magnesium and iron, our Chia Seeds are a great addition to any diet. Containing high fiber, protein & omega-3 content, this is a must have in all your meals. Raw, Juicing, Vegan, Paleo, Keto, Clean Eating, Wellness, Active, Biohacking, Life Hacking, Yoga, Spiritual, Blending, Non-GMO, Plant Based.

COUNTLESS RECIPES: Healthworks Chia Seed is a perfect addition to smoothies, shakes, juices, oatmeal, cereals, yogurt, baked goods, protein cookies, salads, stir-fries, peanut-butter, breads, pies, trail mix, granola bars, fresh fruit like apples or blackberries, desserts and snack foods. It can also serve as a thicker in sauces and an egg replacement in baking.

NATURAL ORIGIN: Healthworks Chia Seeds are sustainably grown and sourced from small farmers. We have been a market leader for many years and strive to provide only the very best nature has to offer. In the ancient Mayan language, the word ÒchiaÓ meant strength so this is a must have staple in your diet!
OUR MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE: 100% Money-Back Satisfaction Guarantee, No Questions Asked! We will offer a 30-day money back guarantee on any product you have purchased from HEALTHWORKS directly.
